# Installation and Configurations

For this project the following libraries are needed: 
- python >= 3.7 <br>
- mysql-connector-python version: 8.0.18 <br>
- additional libraries for eggnog-mapper tool version 2.1.2, available here https://github.com/eggnogdb/eggnog-mapper/wiki/eggNOG-mapper-v2.1.2

<br>
For installation execute <name>, it will create:
- conda environnement with all the required libraries
- install eggnog-mapper 

For privacy reasons you need to enter your username and password to connect to mysql
